tables: CREATE TABLE user_account (user_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE,user_email VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,user_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,user_password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_group_id INT,user_role INT)

ALTER TABLE exercise_recording ADD CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_account(user_id)

CREATE TABLE user_profile (user_id INT UNIQUE NOT NULL,First_name VARCHAR(100),Last_name VARCHAR(100),avatar_url VARCHAR(255),introduction TEXT,height DECIMAL(5,2),weight DECIMAL(5,2),fitness_level TINYINT,fitness_goals TEXT,birthday TIMESTAMP,training_start_date TIMESTAMP,phone VARCHAR(10),Email VARCHAR(255),country VARCHAR(100),city VARCHAR(100),state VARCHAR(100),PRIMARY KEY (user_id))
